statements: DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE film_screening_id = 'c2c3b4c2-e331-4f26-ae11-80e0d45d0413' AND quantity_sold > 5;
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE film_screening_id = 'db6b618d-9e2a-4c26-8874-8d88bef6ced6' AND quantity_sold > 10
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM film_screening WHERE available_seats <= 10 AND screening_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund' AND transaction_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01' AND sale_amount < 50.00;
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE customer_id = 'b1d96cee-9bbd-4a3e-a9f4-b4a8b2c10b7f' AND film_id = '58471c51-5a3b-4e9a-b598-ffeeb16a4bae';
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 5 AND ticket_total_price < 100.00;
